Name: Frequency of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ compared to \SW-Reviewer Agreed\
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of manuscripts that reach \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ after \SW-EIC Accept\
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Number of times \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ occurs after \First Look-Your updates are overdue\
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'First Look-Your updates are overdue' occurs

Name: Percentage of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ occurrences out of all activities in the review process
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases where '' does not happen

Name: Frequency of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ as a concluding activity in a variant
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' occurs

Name: Ratio of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ occurrences to \Manuscript Export Succeeded\ occurrences
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Number of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ occurrences preceded by \First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation\
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Percentage of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ occurrences that lead to \Manuscript Export Succeeded\
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Frequency of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ in relation to the total number of cases in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases where '' does not happen

Name: Percentage of cases involving \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ that eventually reach \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Number of variants that include \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ as part of the process
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity '' does not occur

Name: Percentage of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ occurrences following \First Look-Please submit updates\
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'First Look-Please submit updates'

Name: Ratio of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ to \SW-AE Assign Reviewers\ in terms of frequency
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Frequency of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ as the final activity before manuscript acceptance
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' occurs

Name: Percentage of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ occurrences that are followed by a successful manuscript export
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'
